profile.name: Andrey Karpovich
profile.about: I'm a Frontend Software Engineer with about 5 years of professional experience in the field of web development. Broad expertise in improving, extending, testing, and maintaining UI of modern software applications, including support of inner-library entities and common modules. Great team player, able to explain complex problems in a simplified way, with helpful examples and demos. Currently looking for on-site (in Portugal) or remote model of working.
profile.interests: Woodworking, guitar, maps + geospatial, chess, drone-filming

projects.name: Pacta Cloud (BlockAxs)
projects.tech: Angular 11, Angular Material 11 (elements with customization), rxjs, i18n, sweetalert;  fxLayout, scss, styles-theming
projects.desc: Pacta (BlockAxs) automates the creation, editing, negotiation, signature and management of your contracts. Our document generators are built on your contract texts and a set of questions that you can define. Based on the answers to these questions, an individualized (incl. gendering), perfectly formatted draft contract is automatically created. In this way, you will be able to create your documents in a matter of minutes in the future. Also have various contract data clearly summarized or tabulated.
